title: WTB VG to VGEX T205 Commons
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: WTB VG to VGEX T205 Commons
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy the following T205 commons in VG to VGEX condition:

Archer
Bailey
Bates
Daubert
Hemphill
Kroh
Lang
Magee
McLean
Merkle
Mithcell
Pelty
Schulte
Simmons
Stanage
Thomas
Wilson

I'm interested in graded or raw and would prefer cards that are crease and wrinkle free.  Border chipping is acceptable but paper loss inside the gold frame or on the reverse is not.  I would consider cards that have creases or wrinkles as long as there's no paper loss.  Please send a PM or email me at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

Thanks!

Kevin
